name: BreatheLUV
description:
Eve Thomas x TRU LUV presents BreatheLUV, a tiny moment for reflection and a preview of what moments are to come in our upcoming game #SelfCare.

If you like, some animations in BreatheLUV may sync to your current heart rate. If you grant access, BreatheLUV will use the Apple Health app and the Apple Watch to measure your heart rate. Your heart rate is stored locally on your Apple Watch and on your iPhone and is never transmitted anywhere else. It's just a soft, subtle connection between BreatheLUV and you. We love syncing up. <3

If you are interested, visit http://www.truluv.ai/selfcare/ to learn more about #SelfCare.

<3 Let's take a moment. <3
